ThingDef.label: boilerplate
ThingDef.description: A revolutionary combination of engineering and medieval technology. This steam-powered boilerplate suit uses steam to move the suit and power modules. It is incredibly heavy without steam powering the apparatus, however when sufficiently powered, it feels less heavy than plate armor./n/nDevices will be inactive and movement will be greatly reduced when steam is not available./n/nModules Accepted:/n/nHead/nBody/nArm/nCore/nBack/nLeg

ThingDef.label: module (generator) - flashfire pack
ThingDef.description: A pack of wood, meat, and haygrass designed to quickly burn at a high temperature./n/nProduces 10 steam per second, burns 2 units per second until used up./n/nWhen used up, this module is automatically discarded.

RecipeDef.label: make flashfire pack
RecipeDef.description: Make a flashfire pack out of haygrass, wood, and meat.

ThingDef.label: module (generator) - everburn pack
ThingDef.description: A pack of wood, meat, and cloth designed to slowly burn at a low temperature./n/nProduces 2 steam per second, burns 0.5 units per second until used up./n/nWhen used up, this module is automatically discarded.

RecipeDef.label: make everburn pack
RecipeDef.description: Make an everburn pack out of cloth, wood, and meat.

ThingDef.label: module (generator) - steadyflame pack
ThingDef.description: A pack of wood, cloth, and haygrass designed to burn at a moderate temperature./n/nProduces 5 steam per second, burns 1 unit per second until used up./n/nWhen used up, this module is automatically discarded.

RecipeDef.label: make steadyflame pack
RecipeDef.description: Make a steadyflame pack out of haygrass, wood, and cloth.

ThingDef.label: module (arm) - steam blaster
ThingDef.description: A specialized vent system that allows stored up steam energy to be discharged in a damaging cloud of piping hot steam, burning any targets caught in its wake./n/nConsumes 100 steam per use.

li.label: steamblast
li.description: Fires a burst of steam in the targetted direction, burning targets in its effect./n/nUses 100 steam.

ThingDef.label: module (arm) - net launcher
ThingDef.description: A contraption pre-loaded with 5 thick nets. The nets can be launched using steam to dramatically slow down a target caught in the effect./n/nOnce all nets are used, the module is discarded./n/nConsumes 20 steam per use.

li.label: netlauncher
li.description: Launches a cloth net at the target, slowing them down./n/nUses 20 steam.

ThingDef.label: module (arm) - poultice dispenser
ThingDef.description: A container of mashed up healroot that can be used to tend wounds quickly or apply the compound at range./n/nOnce all charges are used, the module is discarded./n/nConsumes 10 steam per use.

li.label: poulticedispenser
li.description: Fires a glob of mashed up healroot at the target./n/nUses 10 steam.

ThingDef.label: module (arm) - reaper razor
ThingDef.description: A large scissors-like device mounted on the arm. Increases plant tend speed and can be engaged to instantly cut a small area of plants./n/nConsumes 60 steam per use.

li.label: reaperrazor
li.description: Deploys the massive scissors to instantly cut down plants in the effect./n/nUses 60 steam.

ThingDef.label: module (leg) - pressure pistons
ThingDef.description: A set of pneumatic pistons attached to the legs of the boilerplate. The offset the standard movement penalty of the boilerplate, allowing a pawn to move uninhibited while steam is present./n/nConsumes 0.25 steam per second.

ThingDef.label: module (leg) - jetstream bound
ThingDef.description: A set of vents and pressure chambers lined along the legs, allowing for the pooling and release of a massive amount of steam capable of propelling a pawn a short distance./n/nConsumes 200 steam per use.

li.label: jetstreamjump
li.description: Vents the stored steam and propels the pawn at the target location./n/nUses 200 steam.

ThingDef.label: module (leg) - auxilliary tanks
ThingDef.description: Adds two additional storage tanks to the boilerplate, above each leg. The tanks slow the boilerplate down slightly./n/nAdds 400 steam capacity. Lowers movement by 0.4.

ThingDef.label: module (body) - redirection array
ThingDef.description: Armor plates with interlaid steam piping throughout, serves as an insulating buffer versus temperature effects./n/nDrains 0.1 steam per second while worn.

ThingDef.label: module (body) - steel plates
ThingDef.description: Reinforced steel armor plates attached to the boilerplate, provides exceptional sharp resistance to the user at no steam cost.

ThingDef.label: module (body) - stuffed padding
ThingDef.description: Steel frames with cloth padding added in the middle to soften blunt blows. Largely ineffective against bladed weapons but surprisingly effective against blunt weapons. Moderately insulates the wearer.

ThingDef.label: module (back) - small steam tank
ThingDef.description: A small steam tank mounted on the back of the boilerplate that stores generated steam. Small enough that it won't weigh down the suit./n/nProvides 300 steam capacity.

ThingDef.label: module (back) - medium steam tank
ThingDef.description: A medium steam tank mounted on the back of the boilerplate that stores generated steam. Slightly weighs down the user but does not affect work speed./n/nProvides 500 steam capacity. Lowers movement by 0.2.

ThingDef.label: module (back) - large steam tank
ThingDef.description: A large steam tank mounted on the back of the boilerplate that stores generated steam. Weighs the suit down considerably and impacts work speed./n/nProvides 700 steam capacity. Lowers movement by 0.4 and workspeed by 10%.

ThingDef.label: module (head) - zero-lens
ThingDef.description: A series of telescoping lenses that provide long range sight capabilities far beyond that of the naked eye. Improves ranged accuracy but lowers melee accuracy and drains steam passively./n/nDoes not provide any protection./n/nDrains 0.2 steam per second. Increases ranged accuracy by 5. Lowers melee accuracy by 10.

ThingDef.label: module (head) - protective mask
ThingDef.description: A sealed mask that is reinforced with steam tubes, providing a higher degree of protection./n/nDoes not drain steam.

ThingDef.label: module (head) - sauna sallet
ThingDef.description: A moderately protective helmet that has a special filter and venting system integrated. This produces a constant spray of soothing mist, reducing their mental break threshold while still providing some protection./n/nDrains 0.1 steam per second. Lowers mental break threshold by 10%

ThingDef.label: steambow
ThingDef.description: An oversized crossbow that uses steam to pressurize a pneumatic lever system, allowing ballista bolts to be loaded and fired. Requires steam to charge the device, does not drain steam while fully charged./n/nDrains 1 steam per second while charging.

ThingDef.label: heat cleaver
ThingDef.description: A specially modified axe that is directly hooked up to a steam vent, allowing the edge to be red hot at almost all times due to the steam. Burns targets in addition to cutting them, and only requires additional steam to heat the blade back up./n/nDrains 1 steam per second while heating. Adds up to 8 burn damage per attack.

ThingDef.label: stone flinger
ThingDef.description: A crude device that fires pebbles and rocks using steam. Highly inaccurate but devastatinly powerful at close range. Requires steam to charge./n/nDrains 1 steam per second while charging.
